author: Ross Burden
method: Preheat the oven to 200C/400F/Gas 6. Grease a six-hole muffin tin with butter. Blend together the butter, coconut, sugar, flour and eggs in a food processor, until smooth. Transfer the mixture to a bowl and stir through the mango and chilli. Divide the mixture evenly into the muffin tin holes and place in the oven for 15 minutes, or until a skewer pushed into a muffin comes out clean.
ingredients: 110g/4oz butter,  2 tbsp creamed coconut, grated ,  110g/4oz caster sugar,  110g/4oz self-raising flour,  2 free-range eggs,  ½ mango, peeled and roughly diced,  ½ red chilli, de-seeded and finely chopped
